books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Difficult choices surface when Hope Anderson and Tru Walls meet in a North Carolina seaside town.
books.name: EVERY BREATH

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.
books.name: FIRE AND BLOOD

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Alex Cross returns for the 26th book in the series bearing his name.
books.name: TARGET: ALEX CROSS

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A dog sets out across 400 miles of wilderness to find the man who rescued her as a puppy.
books.name: A DOG'S WAY HOME

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born and a Canadian couple now find themselves stranded.
books.name: PAST TENSE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Atlee Pine, an F.B.I. agent who is haunted by the childhood kidnapping of her twin sister, must choose between protecting her career or the United States' democracy.
books.name: LONG ROAD TO MERCY

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A romance writer becomes fascinated by the owner and director of a health resort.
books.name: NINE PERFECT STRANGERS

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: The sequel to "The Five People You Meet in Heaven" follows Annie on her heavenly journey.
books.name: THE NEXT PERSON YOU MEET IN HEAVEN

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: Isabelle Flanders Tookus calls on a group of women known as the Sisterhood to save a millionaire's genius grandson.
books.name: SAFE AND SOUND

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A man who is losing weight without getting thinner forms an unlikely alliance with his neighbors who are dealing with prejudices.
books.name: ELEVATION

books.author: by Marc Cameron
books.description: President Jack Ryan must contain the fallout of a flu epidemic, an undermining senator and two hijacked Russian nuclear missiles.
books.name: TOM CLANCY: OATH OF OFFICE
